blocked.short_desc: CVE-2024-40857 webkitgtk: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting

long_desc.thetext: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting. This issue was addressed through improved state management.
https://webkitgtk.org/security/WSA-2024-0005.html
This https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=CVE-2024-40857 is a WebArchive bug. We're not affected; it only affects Apple platforms and Windows.

More information about this security flaw is available in the following bug:
